attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK callers currently pay 50p a minute or £30 an hour for the priviledge of requesting assistance from leading service providers. Calling O870 numbers is also excessively high.  These numbers should also be abolised.  Utility companies and banks should be encouranged to make 0800 (free phone numbers)available to their customers for all grades of service.
